2Compiling
To compile the example:
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to <EiffelEnvision_installation_path>\envision\examples\wel\printer\ and select printer_demo.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Click Add project
Browse to $ISE_EIFFEL\examples\wel\printer\.
Choose printer.ecf
Choose the location where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the configuration file.
Click OK.
2Running
After launching the program, a window will be displayed as illustrated above. Selecting "Print" from the "File" menu will open a print dialog which will allow you to specify a printer and additional print information before printing the contents of the window.
2Under the Hood MAIN_WINDOW inherits ../../reference/windows/wel_frame_window_chart.xmlWEL_FRAME_WINDOW and the feature on_paint has been redefined to display the output in the client area. A /libraries/wel/content/stddlgs/wel_print_dialog.xmlWEL_PRINT_DIALOG is used to retrieve the print options before the printing occurs through the interface provided by a ../../reference/gdi/wel_printer_dc_chart.xmlWEL_PRINTER_DC. This sample contains the following classes:
APPLICATION_IDS
MAIN_WINDOW
PRINTER_DEMO
